long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Datassential SNAP Assistant lets you quickly look up information for any trend you come across while browsing the web.  You can also ask SNAP questions about food trends, restaurant chains, retailers, and more.  Ask it things like “gochujang”, “top sandwich proteins”, “taco bell news”, or “top QSR chains in Miami.”  And if you’ve enabled your microphone, you can also use your voice to chat.

After installing the extension, you’ll see the SNAP icon in the upper right of your screen.  Click the icon anytime to open the chat window or access the settings menu.  We promise it’s easy… give it a try!

NOTE: your company must be currently subscribed to Datassential SNAP to use this tool.
